G

Game - Class in controller
A representation of a current game in progress

Begins a Game with these Users as players
Game - Class in UI
A utility class for GameBoardDisplay

Gameboard - Interface in model
An interface for the gameboard model for the TTT system.
GameBoardDisplay - Class in UI
The UI for a game session

Builds and then draws the UI for a session of TTT

Sets up a GameBoard for a new game.
